title: Looking for potential duo partner/team.
body:
Hey everyone! I'm a silver 5 (silver 4 in ranked flex) adc/mid lane main, although I'm comfortable playing most roles. I'm looking for a potential duo partner or even team. I'm fine with skype or discord for team communication, although I'd prefer skype (lot easier for me). If you're interested just send a friend request my way on league. 
{{sticker:slayer-jinx-catface}}

replies.body: added, i'm an adc/mid main aswell but mostly adc, currently g5 (havn't played flex just chilling and waiting for next season) will probs play with you later on next season if we're both in silver :P
